name: team_rename
long_desc: My Slack API Start here App features Messages Reference Slack App Directory Authentication Keep in touch Community The workspace name has changed  				Compatibility:									RTM 													Events API 							 The team_rename event is sent to all connections for a workspace when an admin changes the workspace name. Clients can use this to update the display of the workspace name as soon as it changes. If they don't the client will receive the new name the next time it calls rtm.start.
